goal.en: This is a one-year introductory course to economics. This course is designed to give students a thorough understanding of economics and to help generalize concepts of economics. This semester we will focus on macroeconomics in which topics include measuring a nation’s income, the monetary system, inflation and unemployment, international finance, economic fluctuations. This course will present basic analytical tools and apply them to various facts of life.
goal.ch: 這門經濟學是一學年的課程, 這個課程提供學生關於經濟學的經本概念. 這學期我們將關注在總體經濟的部分, 內容包括: 國民所得的衡量, 貨幣系統, 通貨膨漲與失業, 國際金融, 經濟波動. 這門課程將提供一些基本的分析工具, 用他們來解釋一些總體經濟現象.

content.en:
1.Measuring a Nation’s Income
2.Measuring the Cost of Living
3.Production and Growth
4.Saving, Investment, and the Financial System
5.The Basic Tools of Finance
6.Unemployment
7.The Monetary System
8.Money Growth and Inflation
9.Open-Economy Macroeconomics: Basic Concept
10.A Macroeconomic Theory of the Open Economy
11.Aggregate Demand and Aggregate Supply
12.The Influence of Monetary and Fiscal Policy on Aggregate Demand
content.ch:

6.失業

8.貨幣供給成長與物價膨脹
9.開放體系的總體經濟學：基本概念

11.總合需求與總合供給
12.貨幣與財政政策對總合需求的影響
